name: 💖✨Sparkle Tales✨💖
description:
Something fishy is going on at Adriann Lake High School! The books are all coming up blank. A dark matter called The Corruption has seeped into the school and has caused a labyrinth to form. It's up to Cyra, Wren, Angélia, and their magical guide Ivona to use their magical girl alter egos to find who is being affected by The Corruption and close the labyrinth before English class gets canceled, PERMANENTLY.

The Team!

Game Writer/Narrative Designer: Britney 
Socials: Twitter, Itch.io,

Artist: Marina
Socials:  Youtube, Twitter

Programmer: Slyonics
Socials: Itch.io

Sound Design and Music:  Canslli
Socials: SoundCloud

A submission for Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023.
